sentences.en: Now triangular blades farther back , like secateurs, help the stoat to cut meat away from bone.
sentences.cn: 而后颚上三角切齿则如整枝剪刀一般, 帮助鼬把肉从骨上切下来.

sentences.en: Secateurs give you a wonderful feeling of power; and you become menace to all you survey.
sentences.cn: 剪枝夹给你一种美妙的力量感, 你对所有看到的东西都构成威胁.

sentences.en: Secateurs give you a wonderful feeling of power; and you becoming menace to all you survey.
sentences.cn: 剪枝夹给你一种美妙的力量感, 你对所有看到的物品都构成威胁.

trans.tran_en: strong scissors used for cutting plant stems
